name: Holo-Graham
description: Holo-Graham is a strategic puzzle game based in a 4D World!Record your holo-grahams to perform actions in real time and work along side them to solve complex puzzles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel i5 or greater Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel i5 or greater Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 150 MB available space
